para_sentences.para_19: Why do we no longer need to have an explicit check for whether any of the numbers are equal?
para_sentences.para_20: Modify this code (or one of the other versions) so that if all number choices are different it behaves the same, but if exactly two players choose the same number, then the other player wins. If all three players choose the same number then no one wins.
